messages.subject: Clan in New York?
messages.msgSnippet: hello, i was wondering if anyone knows if there are any samurai clans in the SCA that are around NEW YORK STATE? Meaning,... is there a clan that specifically
messages.messageBody:
hello,
i was wondering if anyone knows if there are any samurai clans in the SCA that are around NEW YORK STATE? Meaning,... is there a clan that specifically focuses on wearing samurai armour to the SCA events??? If so, please let me know. I've checked the SCA website and couldn't find any. Thank you.
mark

P.S. I take kendo. Will that be helpful in fighting in these events?? I've never been to one but have heard a lot of awesome things about them. Thanks again.
